user_questions.text: help me come up with a 1 hour virtual workshop for AI prompting for work skills

user_statements.text: Make it interactive and use principles from liberating structures

decisions_visible.choice: Using Liberating Structures for AI literacy workshop
decisions_visible.evidence: Explicit request to incorporate these principles

projects.name: AI Prompting for Work Skills Workshop
projects.focus: AI literacy and practical prompting skills
projects.evidence: Bilal designing this workshop in April 2023

concepts.name: Liberating Structures
concepts.application: Bilal's preferred approach for interactive workshops

concepts.name: AI Prompting
concepts.context: Work skills enhancement through AI (ChatGPT era)

explicit_values.quote: Make it interactive and use principles from liberating structures

implicit_beliefs.evidence: Requests background on how AI works before prompting techniques

implicit_beliefs.belief: Learning should be collaborative, not lecture-based

implicit_beliefs.evidence: TRIZ structure uses constraints (visual-only prompts) to drive innovation

caps_visible: Early AI adoption and literacy building
patterns.communication_style: Concise request with clear constraints and methodology preference
patterns.meta_pattern: Using AI to design AI literacy workshops (meta-level pragmatism)

significance: Captures Bilal's facilitation philosophy and early AI adoption (April 2023). Liberating Structures = core methodology for participatory learning. Shows commitment to non-hierarchical, interactive education - consistent with educator background and Bloom/DEFY philosophy.

30 Day Challenge program (same date) - active program facilitation

liberating_structures_as_signature.implication: Likely used across other Bloom/DEFY programs
liberating_structures_as_signature.cross_validation_needed: Check for Liberating Structures in earlier/later conversations
